1111.content:
Tifa smiled to herself as she watched the last of her customers leave the bar for the evening, closing the door behind them, and slipping all of the locks into place. The rebuilt 7th Heaven was a thriving business, an integral part of the ever growing Neo Midgar, a city that was being built up from the remains of the past, and she wouldn't of had it any other way. Tifa made her way back over to the bar itself to run a warm, wet cloth over the top, rubbing a little to make the surface shine. It felt strange to go back to being a bartender, after having saved the world, but in her mind she knew that it was the right thing to do. She had no other home to go to, and given the world had almost gone to hell, everyone could do with going somewhere to relax and forget their worries.

Yawning, Tifa stretched her slender arms high above her head, closing her eyes as she felt her shoulders tense, then sink in relaxation. It was rewarding work, but it was hard work, and left Tifa with a lot of late nights to contend with. Making sure that everything was switched off for the night, Tifa made her way upstairs, to the small apartment she lived in above the bar. She was exhausted, and the thought of a hot bath and snuggling down into her bed was the one that appealed the most to her. Tifa padded into her apartment and made for the bathroom right away, turning on the hot taps and letting the bath tub fill up with water. Sitting down on the edge of the bath, Tifa leant down to peel her shoes off, before undoing the belt that clipped her black skirt into place. As it fell about her ankles, Tifa gazed down at herself for a long moment, frowning as her thin fingers felt over the slightly rounded curve of her stomach.

"I've got to cut down on the free drinks," Tifa admitted to herself on feeling the considerable beer belly that was sticking out from underneath her cropped white top, a perfect curve of flesh that felt warm to the touch, "I forget how many calories are in those things." She pulled her top off to join her skirt down on the floor, before climbing into the hot, bubbly bathwater. She closed her eyes, relaxing as she sank down into the water completely, her long dark hair curling in soft tendrils in the water about her. She could forget about the bar for a moment, about her worries over Cloud, about the beer belly that was starting to show given her skimpy work uniform.

"I'm sorry, Marlene," Barret sighed as he hung up, "You need help. You're not right if you do something like this, kid." Marlene stuck out her lower lip into a pout, tears glistening in her brown eyes. Barret wrapped a muscular arm about Marlene to pull her back, but not before several pounds of weight had been added to the already immobile Tifa's massive waist. Her obsession with weight gain never really stopped as she grew older, she had gained a considerable amount herself, and was focused on trying to get everyone else to become massively overweight too. It was a slow and steady process that saw the obsession with other's weight start to fade, and after several psychological assessments, the much heavier Marlene was allowed into a less strict home. It was only when they discovered that Marlene had held a poor nurse hostage and stuffed her to the point of bursting that they realised their mistake, and she was confined once more.

Tifa was really never the same after that wish. Barret, Cloud, and even Rufus ShinRa had worked with the materia trying to bring her mind back to a normal state, but a lot of the power had been used up by the original wish. The best they could do was to at least stop her hunger and whining, though it gave her a childlike state of mind. Rufus had gone one step further into paying for surgery to help Tifa lose the sheer amount of weight; if she stayed at that size, she would die. Several years of careful dieting and rehabilitation had bought Tifa down to just twenty pounds over her original weight, her entire body softer without the toning she had gotten from fighting.

Yuffie took over the 7th Heaven bar for her, and made sure that while the girls were big, they would never get anywhere close to how big Tifa had become, the idea unsettled her so deeply, she lost sleep thinking about it. Her beautiful, smart friend had been reduced to so little, and all because of one selfish little girl. Yuffie rubbed at her forehead, they said Marlene was insane, she personally thought the girl was smarter than she let on, and that scared her even more. Yuffie slimmed down a little out of anxiety, food didn't seem quite the same to her.

Tifa was in a home too now, one for mentally challenged adults who would never be well enough to function in society on their own. She spent her days mostly gazing out of the window, with flashes of memory of the life she once had, a half smile on her face. Cloud visited daily, and while she would smile at him, there was only a hint of his best friend left in those brown eyes. He would force a smile back, and sit with her on hours on end, her small hand in his. Every now and again her eyes would light up, as if about to return to herself, only for them to fade again.

She noticed the red light of her answering machine flashing in the mirror, and turned to press the button to hear her messages, turning away in the meantime to pad through to the kitchen. She hadn't eaten since breakfast, and that had been just fruit and cereal, it really was no wonder she had actually managed to lose weight lately from her already thin frame.

Her food forgotten, Lightning reached the hospital in record time, no doubt breaking a good few laws on the way to get the maximum speed that she could. She barked her sister's name at the poor receptionist on duty, before striding past her to the correct part of the hospital, her mind straying as she walked down the narrow hallway as briskly as she could. Snow's message had been shaky, and hard to understand at best, but he had managed to choke out that he and Serah had gotten into an accident when she had been practising her driving. Lightning's thin lips drew in tightly against one another, her first instinct was to blame Snow completely for the entire thing, but the nagging part of her mind reminded her that it wasn't the way to go, no matter how frightened she was for her sister.

On reaching the right floor, Lightning could see Snow sat in the waiting area, his broad form stooped over as he rested his hands down on his knees. He looked up on hearing Lightning's footsteps echo on the tiled floor, a bandage wrapped about his forehead, a severe looking graze on his cheek. He looked a little relieved to see the elder Farron sister, and stood up, hjis eyes red rimmed and his skin a little paler than usual underneath the artificial lights.

"Light," he greeted her hoarsely, his usually playfulness absent from his tone, "Sorry.. been tryin' to get hold of you all day." Lightning looked him over with a critical blue-green stare, before touching her hands to his wide shoulders, and forced him to sit back down in his chair. He was injured, and she noted that he was shaking slightly, no doubt he was in shock still. He shouldn't have been left alone, despite her worry for her sister, Lightning felt a frustrated urge to grab the nearest doctor and demand to know why that had happened. Instead she sank into the seat next to him, folding her arms across her chest.

"How is she?" Lightning asked after a moment of silence between them, she knew if Serah had been well enough for visitors, then Snow would be in there grasping her tiny hand in his. Given he was stuck in the corridor outside, that meant Serah was still being taken care of, and that he probably knew no more than her about how she was doing. She was correct as Snow shook his head slowly, his blond hair swaying slightly from the motion.

"I dunno," he admitted with a sigh, folding his arms back onto his knees, "Haven't seen her since they bought us in. It was bad, Light," he added, looking over to her with light blue eyes, "I don't know what happened. Serah turned the car, then there was a massive crashin' sound. They told me later that we'd collided with a truck," he added, reaching up to massage over his brow, "Guess Serah didn't see it coming. I didn't wake up until I got here, and Serah was already in the theatre by the time I was allowed to get out of bed." He bowed his head, biting down hard over his lower lip, his hands clenching at his knees. "Bet you hate me, huh?" Lightning watched him, before slowly shaking her head, leaning back in her seat and crossing one leg over the other.

"No," she responded as calmly as ever, "Accidents happen. As much as I want to blame you for this.. I can't bring myself to. Right now," she took a moment to gather her thoughts, before heaving a soft sigh, "... right now Serah needs for us to be strong for her. It won't solve anything if we blame anyone. We just need to be there for her, and wait until we get some news," she looked sidelong to Snow, her eyes narrowing a little, "You look like crap. You should go home and rest. I can inform you if anything happens." Snow snorted softly, leaning back against the wall behind his chair.

"No way. I ain't leavin' until I know what's going on," Snow responded stubbornly, "I can't rest when Serah's like this!" Lighting sighed, shaking her head to herself. It was a predictable outcome, but it wasn't as if she hadn't tried to get the older man to go home. She closed her eyes for a moment against the gritty feeling underneath her eyelids, it had been a very long day at work, what she really needed to do now was get some much needed sleep. Not that she could blame her poor little sister for getting herself into a car accident, and she never would, no matter how much sleep she lost because of it.

Noticing Lightning had been quiet for a matter of time now, Snow glanced over to the rose haired female, stunned to see her asleep. Lightning had her head tilted back against the wall, her leg still crossed over the other, her usually stern face somewhat softer and peaceful looking as she slept. Snow studied her for a while, it was at that moment he could see even more of a resemblance between Lightning and her younger sister. Lightning looked exhausted underneath the harsh lighting, shadows underneath her eyes, and even Snow noticed that she had dropped weight recently. He shook his head to himself, leaning back against the wall as he gazed at the clock opposite. When Serah found out, she was bound to have words with her sister.

It was hours later that a doctor finally emerged from one of the rooms, looking shattered and unkempt, his brow speckled with sweat. Snow sat up the moment he approached the pair, the rustling of fabric jerked Lightning awake, and she too focused up on the doctor with bleary sea green eyes.

"You're sure?" she questioned the doctor wearily, who looked a little taken aback at being asked such a question, before dropping his gaze down to Lightning's very prominent bump.

"Yes," he nodded, ".. I'm quite certain, Miss Farron."

It was almost ironic that Snow had taken the news far better than she had. The moment she casually told him over dinner, his eyes lit up in that oddly endearing boyish way, and he had moved from his seat to pick her up into a tight hug against him. Lightning fought to catch her breath as the taller set her down again, a large hand resting over the curve of her rounded stomach. His grin grew even wider, only falling some on looking back up to his girlfriend, who seemed to look more worried than anything.

"You're not excited, Light?" Snow questioned as he rose to his full height again, his hands folding over her shoulders, "Oh.. you're pissed I knocked you up, aren't you?" he added sheepishly, "I mean talk about unlucky, the first time and all." He was trying, and failing, to hide how excited he truly was. Lightning shook her head slightly, resting her softer hand on top of the baby bump. Just over a year ago she had been a fit, fighting soldier. She was now a chubby mother to be, the woman her sister had aspired to become one day, and the woman Lightning never thought would be her.

"I'm not angry," Lightning admitted as she looked back up to Snow, "I'm worried. I can't do this.. how can I be a mother? These hands," she looked down at her palm, her brow furrowing, "These are used to fight. They have blood on them. They're not the hands that hold a child. This.." she closed her eyes, ".. this should have been Serah. Not me." Snow watched her, before reaching out and grasping that hand in his, gently pulling her fingers back to expose the palm, placing a kiss to it.

"Maybe," he agreed, "But the fact is that it's not Serah. It's you. You're Lightning," he pointed out, "You're the hard ass who can knock me over when you get pissed off. You're the person who cares about those close to you, even if you try to hide it. Sure this came out of no-where but," he shrugged a wide shoulder, "Hasn't everything this year? This is just another thing in life. Another thing that you're going to adapt to and be amazing at. Trust me," he grinned, a flash of white teeth appearing behind his lips, "I know you, Light."

Uncertainty still gripped at her, but Lightning couldn't help but feel somewhat comforted by his words, by his simple belief in her. She gasped as she felt him touch her stomach again, before picking her up easily, and throwing her, gently, over his shoulder. "Hey! What are you doing?!" she demanded as Snow began to carry her off, chuckling all the while. She fought to escape, only to be lowered gently onto the bed once he had managed to get her upstairs.

" You know what?" Snow grinned at her, lowering himself to rest his toned stomach to hers, "You're cute when you get mad.."

11313.content:
The Queen was an imposing young woman, both in personality, and size. She had blown up like a water balloon, almost since day one. And now, she had reached a truly impressive girth. Her belly bobbed up and down with every step, and on its downward trip, it regularly brushed the ground. The day seemed to be fast approaching when her belly would simply rest on the ground as a matter of course. In fact, this outcome seemed so obvious, that debates were raging behind the scene as to whether it could be kept from anchoring down the queen through means of magic, technology, a use of helpers holding it up, or whether some soft of harness system could be built into her dresses, keeping it at least from draping the ground. It occurred to many that this was probably the first time such debate echoed through this castle.

If her belly was a source of concern, her bosom was simply a source of awe. Always hefted up proudly by powerful dresses, she was almost never seen in public without cleavage big enough to lose something in. At night, when her and Crono retired to their private chambers for some personal time, the removal of her clothing, particularly around the breasts, resembled a dam bursting.

Her ass, too, was simply shocking. No matter how generous the proportions on the dresses she wore, her ass always pushed the stitches to the limit, and swelled out so dramatically, that they were always skintight, and left little to the imagination.

But while the queen's ever-growing fat deposits started out as a source of gossip and jokes, it didn't take too long before the people of her kingdom began to get almost swept up in it, and as their biggest influence and role model, conventional standards of beauty began to change dramatically across the land.

Women everywhere began to indulge more, reasoning that if their beloved queen did it, it couldn't be so bad. And with how undeniably stunning the queen was, in spite of our because of her size, the husbands of all the newly fattening women were seldom bothered by the developments of their wives.

It wasn't long before the average weight of Guardia's female population had grown by leaps and bounds, and women were trading dieting tips that headed in the opposite direction. Enjoying the impact that here own simple gluttony had sparked, the queen announced a new annual fair: every year, there would be a massive celebration of food, full of feasts and festivities. And there would also be a contest, awarding and celebrating the three heaviest women in the kingdom.

But of course, every year, only two of those slots would be filled by anyone but the queen, who won first place every time. The fact that the queen would win had practically become tradition, and few actually expected to be able to beat her...year by year, she had always stayed ahead of the competition, thanks to her private chefs, and the blessing of fat-prone genetics. But still, everyone had fun trying in vain to surpass her, and second and third place were still tremendous honors.

The scale for the event, which had to be impressively powerful and precise, was built anew each year by Lucca, who wanted to perfect a superior version every year, and who had thus far been one of the few women not swept up in the weight gain obsession. When asked if she was against it, she simply said, 'Not at all. But...well, you'll see'. And that was that.

But this year, Lucca had sent a regretful letter explaining that she couldn't spare the time to build a new scale this year, and that they'd have to re-use last year's. This was no problem, but still had everyone puzzled. What was Lucca so busy with? No one knew. She herself had been in her massive, newly-constructed workshop, which was the size of a damn warehouse, and while she kept in touch, nobody had actually seen her for weeks leading up to the fair.

But finally, the night of the event came. With a great sense of ceremony, everyone weighed in, the queen going last, clocking in at an impressive 946 pounds. Just as applause for the inevitable winner was about to ring, though, a speaker began to boom.

"Ladies and gentlemen!" Lucca's voice echoed "Would you please direct your eyes this way!"

Everyone turned to see an enormous platform, rolling on steam-powered wheels, towards them before gradually stopping. There appeared to be some huge, vague shape on the platform, but it was covered in a massive tarp. But then, a crane-like arm unfolded from the side of the platform, and grabbed the tarp, ready to tear it off.

"Everyone...BEHOLD!"

And with a flourish, the tarp was removed, revealing...
11313.title: The Massive Queen

113131.content:
Lucca was beyond fat. Fat was an understatement for what she had become. She had become a hill of flesh. Each of her breasts was bigger, much bigger, than the entire Queen (the nipples were covered by a black fabric, for the sake of the children). To say nothing of the rest of her. Anyone in the audience too close to her couldn't even conceive what they were looking at, from up close she seemed like a curving, skin-colored wall. The genius was so piled high with corpulence, and draped over with so many vast layers of flab, that only the Queen, from her high vantage point, could see her face.

"What have you done?" the Queen asked, shocked.

"I simply decided to provide you with a worthy challenge." Lucca called out calmly, her bright eyes glittering from behind her glasses.

The Queen loved Lucca. She was a great friend. But if not for the audience, she would give her one heck of a talking-to. And not with any sense of superiority as a queen, but an angry talking-to as a betrayed friend. Lucca had humiliated her.

"Is that really all you?" the Queen asked, secretly hoping this was a practical joke, and that Lucca was simply wearing the world's largest, most convincing fat suit.

But no such luck. Lucca began to laugh, and as a demonstration, tried to move her arms (curtained with yards of fat), which did nothing but send waves of jiggling flesh sloshing across her form, rattling the platform she was resting on.

"This is me. All me."

"But...how?"

"Sorry, trade secret. But, uh, would you care to hear how much I weigh?"

Suddenly, a panel rose up from the side of the platform, and numbers began to madly spiral and count up. Until...

23,453 lb.

The Queen's heart sank.She was a speck of dust next to Lucca.
"Lucca!" she shouted "You...win. By far."

"Not yet." she stated.

"...what?"

"Consider how fat I am today to be a declaration. Of my challenge. I didn't come here today to humiliate you, but just to show you what you're up against. Truth is, you've inspired me. I love being this huge, seeing my body stretch so far out of my reach, feeling awash in my own huge, soft body, feeling soooo much ground beneath me, having so much skin to feel the wind blow against, and rain fall and slide down...it's an experience. And I want nothing more than to grow even bigger, even fatter. But how much funner that would be if I have a rival. So, I choose you. I won't share my trick for getting this big, but you're a clever gal. You can find a way of your own, I'm sure. You can't put up with how slowly you've grown so far. Look at you! You're wasting away! So...get huge. Fatten up. Eat, and be merry. And in a month's time, we'll meet again, and see who the real winner is."
The Queen was shocked. It seemed impossible to grow so vast in one month, enough to be in Lucca's league, but...if Lucca could get that big, so could she, dammit! She just had to start thinking outside the box.
"It's a deal!" the queen declared.
Applause roared from the audience. The next month should be entertaining.

11331.content:
The Ioka Tribe thrived under Ayla's leadership. While her command was mostly respected due to her great strength, a nice fringe benefit is that, especially by cave person standards, she was a wise and intelligent leader.

While violent run-in's with the Reptites were common, whenever another human tribe was encountered, things always went swimmingly. In fact, some smaller tribes were so impressed by the size, strength, and traditions of the Ioka Tribe, that they voluntarily chose to join it. With each tribe united with the Ioka, the tribe's strength and stability grew. Ayla's pride in herself and her people ALSO grew.

The tribe often stayed on the move, creating new, temporary villages whenever they found a promising site. But reptites, dinosaurs, and just plain old-fashioned food limitations meant that they often had to stay on the move. But Ayla's tracking instincts, paired with her hunches, always lead them to a new home, and all the many tribe members could rest easy knowing that food, though scarce, would always turn up.

But one day, Ayla sniffed a delicious scent on the wind, and lead her tribe off their course,and deep into an immense cleft in a cliff wall. And there, on the other side...paradise.

There were plains, rich with massive, slow, wonderfully edible herbivorous dinosaurs. The ground was covered in a carpet of delicious roots. And pocketed all over the place were small forests, teeming with more edible li'l critters, and ripe, juicy fruit of every description.

After paying a two-second long prayer of thanks to their gods, the whole tribe began to fan out and snatch up as much food as they could. The vibrant, fertile land seemed to stretch out forever, and there were no reptites or carnivores to be seen.

But, just as Ayla was about to chase a brachiosaurus down and beat it to death with her bare hands for dinner, three strangers, dressed in bright bird plumage, appeared, and address the Ioka.

"Who is leader of your tribe?"

"Ayla is leader." Ayla explained eloquently indicating herself.

"Okay. Not anymore. Ruun is now leader of your tribe. Just letting you know. Thank you. Have nice day."

"WHAT!?" Ayla roared.

"This is land of plenty. All of you welcome to stay. But any who live here follow Ruun."

"Who is Ruun?"

"She is the goddess, the ruler of paradise."

"Ayla want speak to this...Ruun."

"Of course. Ruun welcomes all new followers happily."

"AYLA IS NOT FOLLOWER. Take Ayla to Ruun."

"Follow us."

The strangers lead Ayla to one of the woodlands scattered across the plain. But Ayla was surprised to find that after only a minute spent under the shadow of trees, they came to a clearing. And resting in the middle of the vast clearing...was Ruun. And she was...
11331.title: Ayla Reaches Paradise

113311.content:
...Huge, was quite simply the word for it. Seated on a bamboo palanquin adorned with flowers, jewels, horns, and feathers, was an enormously fat young woman, the largest Ayla had ever seen. Though her seat looked like it could fit three normal women, her bottom still seemed to ooze a bit over the sides. Ruun's feet were just barely visible, most of her legs concealed by the apron of her stomach, a thick expanse of flesh, proudly displaying her great and ample breasts like trophies upon a shelf. She was dressed in nothing but a jeweled necklace and tiara. Her hair and eyes were an emerald green color, and her skin was lightly tanned. At the moment, The "goddess" was being waited upon hand and foot by a cadre of male servants, tending to her whims as she brought a red and juicy fruit to her mouth. The man who had been leading the Ioka to this destination got down on his knees and kowtowed to her.

"Oh, Great Goddess... Please forgive intrusion. Chief of newcomers wish to speak with you."

Ruun bit into the fruit messily, the juices glistening upon her plump lips and cheeks, running down her body. One of the servants reached in to wipe off the mess as she gazed upon the Ioka and their chieftain, who looked upon the spectacle with slack jaws and wide eyes.

"Yes?"

All of the diplomatic tactics that Ayla had been going over during the trip were blown away by the sheer absurdity of what lay before her.

All tact lost, Ayla voiced the first words that came to mind.

"YOU FAT."

Ruun stared blankly for a moment, and then giggled.

"Thank you!"

Shaking off what could have been a major faux pas, Ayla started to speak.

"Me Ayla, lead Ioka tribe. Go through many hard times! Beat Reptites! Beat dinosaurs! Bring in other tribes! Make Ioka big and strong! Want live here, live easy, but no want follow Ruun, but no want fight."

The goddess seemed to consider Ayla's words for a minute. Then, she too began to speak.

"Me Ruun, lead Debu tribe. Live here since forever. Only one tribe in land, or disaster come. Stones and clouds and ancestors say so. Ruun have powers. Special. Ruun fat, so land fat. Ruun fat, Ayla not fat. Ayla no lead. Ioka join Debu or Ioka leave. Sorry."

Ayla fumed, and began to punch into the air.

"Ayla strong! Beat up disaster big time! Beat up Red Star! Beat up everything! Ayla challenge Ruun! Any challenge!"

There was a tense silence that seemed to last an eternity...

...Before it was broken by the shaking of Ruun's laughter.

"Hahaha! Ruun accept challenge. I choose. Leader must be fat. So, if you get fatter than Ruun by full moon, Debu join Ioka, Ayla chief. If you not fatter, Ioka join Debu, Ruun chief... And Ayla servant."

Ayla stared. She was hoping for something along the lines of a hunting contest, or mortal combat, something she could win easily. She wasn't sure about this, but her pride was urging her not to give in so easily.

"Well? What you say?"
113311.title: The Goddess Ruun

1133111.content:
Ayla, truth be told, didn't cherish the thought of making herself enormous, nor did she even like the odds of managing to outgrow Ruun at all. But, she hadn't become the woman she was by backing away from a challenge, no matter what it was or where it came from. So, with not so much as a sliver of doubt exposed, Ayla puffed her chest up with pride, and declared
"Ayla will make Ruun seem like skeleton. Ayla will be biggest, most fertile woman ever lived, or ever will live. Because Ayla is best, Ayla will be biggest."

Ruun, leaning back as much as her hefty rolls of back-fat would allow, reclining and sinking into her own softness, smiled.
"Good wods. But nobody can get bigger than Ruun. You think this big? Ruun only this tiny because there no competition. Actually, thank you. Finally, Ruun has excuse to get as big as a goddess should be."

The two women grinned at each, their eyes burning, in Ayla's case with defiance, in Ruun's case with arrogance. The only sound was the back of Ruun's poor, suffering chair.

Without another word, Ayla turned around, and marched off to get to work on her new goal.

"Kino worried. What if can't beat Ruun? What happen after?"

Ayla snarled, venting her anger slightly. "Ayla beat Ruun! No bow to her! Ayla not care about after. Win and live. lose and die. Rule of life. No change rule. Ayla rather die than lose." 11331111.title: Go Team Ioka!

113311111.content:
Admist the rustling of leaves, a strange man poked out his head out from the foliage. For an instant, the Ioka could not see it, for most of his features were covered in long and shaggy green hair. His mane covered his scalp and then some. Unbelievably bushy eyebrows concealed what his hairdo couldn't. And then there was the matter of his unkempt beard, which touched the ground. Slowly, the rest of him followed. He was tall and bone-thin, and covered in clothing made out of leaves. He propped his scrawny frame upon a gnarled staff, and looked directly at Ayla. Ayla looked up at the intruder with a spiteful glare. "Shut up, old man! Ayla *hic* beat Ruun. You *burp* see." The old man gave out a harsh laugh at this. Suddenly, Kino went up to him an grabbed him.

Kino looked down at her, with a clear look of protest on his face. "But Ayla! Why we trust weird old man? What if poisonous? Or, or..."

Ayla brushed the back of his head with her hand, silencing him. "Kino sweet. But weird old man right. We never beat Ruun like this. But maybe berries will help. Give Ayla berries." Kino found a hard time resisting Ayla. So, despite his initial distrust of the situation, he decided that Ayla was right, and it was worth a shot. He handed the pouch over to Ayla. Suddenly, Ayla felt a tingle up her spine. Her swollen gut began to shrink back to normal. However, this did not last long, as the digested contents were transformed miraculously into fat. "AYLA HUNGRY!"

Sure, she basically got to spend all day lounging around on a king-sized waterbed, munching on bonbons and watching spicy romance movies. So what? She wanted more.

Throwing on a bathroom and high-heeled bunny slippers, she stomped downstairs to the throne room.

"Daddy!" she shrieked. "I'm bored!"

Bowser, startled, dropped the pointer he was using to illustrate his latest plan of war. "Uh--daddy is consulting with his generals, honey, just a minute--"

"But Iiiiiii'm booooored noooooow," Wendy whined, stomping her foot.

"Once I'm done here, I'll find something for you to do," Bowser promised. "How about another date with hunky Troopa actor Robert Patternshell?"

"It's no fun if you have to hold them at spear-point to get them to go out with me!" his daughter whined.

Bowser put his face in his claws in exasperation. "Look, take a magic wand. Take it and...go wreak some havoc on the mushrooms, or something."

He yanked a low-flying Magikoopa out of the air, grabbed her wand, and tossed it to Wendy.

"That's not fun," Wendy complained.

"Then make it fun!" Bowser growled. Sensing she was pushing perilously close to the line, Wendy skedaddled. Bowser plopped down heavily on his throne and heaved a sigh.

He heard a sound, a sniffle, and looked up. The Magikoopa was sobbing into her sleeve. She was quite pudgy, the Koopa King noticed, almost as round as a ball.

"N-now what'll I do for food?" she sniffed.

"What are you sniveling about?" Bowser snapped. He wasn't in any mood for complaints from his underlings today.

--------

Wendy popped out of the warp pipe leading to the Grassland, slapping the want idly against her palm. She wondered what sorts of spells it could do. It looked weird. The golden body of the wand was overlaid with a grid and tapered on the far end, and the crystal was a heavy sphere encrusted with smaller crystals near the handle. It almost looked like a strawberry ice cream cone.

"Zaa!" she said playfully, pointing the wand at a tree and hoping the stupid little plant would burst into splinters. Geometic shapes burst from the end of the wand and sank into the trunk, but instead of exploding, the tree shimmered and writhed in the midday sun. Its bark pulled away, revealing a thick, crumbly trunk, and all its leaves seemed to thicken and turn brown, then green again as something oozed over them.

Wendy stepped forward for a closer look. The leaves looked almost like cookies. Sugar cookies, coated with green frosting. She picked one off and gave it a hesitant nibble. That's just what they were--cookies.

She tossed the rest of the cookie into her mouth and followed it with another, and another. They were delicious, warm and perfectly baked.

Just to satisfy her curiosity, she snapped off a bit of the tree trunk and tried it. It was pure gingerbread.

A cookie wand?, she wondered, taking aim at another tree. "ZAA!"

This one's trunk twisted into a red-and-white candy cane, and its leaves burst into bushels of green sugar jelly mint leaves.

An everything wand! she realized in delight, sweet tooth aching to sink into a mouthful of those leaves. She was happy to give her sweet tooth what it wanted.

ZAA! A lemonade stream.

ZAA! A chocolate boulder.

ZAA! A wedding-cake cliff.

Wendy strolled on, feeling quite good about herself, talking celebratory bites out of the landscape and looking for mischief.
1313321.title: Wendy O. Koopa

choices: She follows the shroom girl home, and ruins both the house and her figure.
Suddenly, "It's-a me!"  Wendy's in trouble now!
13133211.content:
Big Sid E. O. Mycete, mushroom strongman, looked out the window of his charming fungal cottage and saw that the flag on his mailbox was up. "Ah, a letter for me!" he burbled happily. He leaped down the steps, skipped along the sidewalk, and thrust his hand into the...

...pie?

"I say!" Sid said, withdrawing his hand and eying the dripping strawberry filling. "Whatever the deuce happened to my mailbox?"

For where his mailbox had stood, there was only a cherry pie with an oozing handprint on the side, stuck on top of a pretzal stick.

"I improved it a little," said a shrill voice from behind him. "Nice, isn't it?"

He turned to see Wendy O. Koopa, vile daughter of He Who Must Not Be Named (scourge of all good mushrooms everywhere) sashaying towards him, tail swinging back and forth absolutely indecently. She reached right over his shoulder, snapped the mailbox off at the base, and schlorped it down in one large, messy bite.

"Say, now! How's a gent supposed to read his mail?" Sid said hotly.

Wendy giggled. "Not my problem!"

Sid swung at her, but a mushroom strongman is only the equivalent of a Koopa weakman, and his spongy fist bounced right off her scaly hide, knocking him over backwards. His handlebar moustache straightened with rage.

"Now, now, see here! You can't get away with that sort of behavior, madam! I'll notify the constabulary!"

Other mushrooms had come out of their cottages now to see what was going on. Many fled back into their houses at their first glimpse of the dreaded Koopaling girl. Others froze in place, gripped by mortal terror.

"Nobody tells me what I can and can't get away with," Wendy sneered, folding her arms around her chest. "In fact, I might be hungry for a few more mailboxes."

She stepped over Sid, making sure to dig her high heel into his side as she did so, and wandered up and down the street, experimenting with the wand. Mailboxes always turned into pie, it seemed, but what kind of pie different. The next one was blueberry, followed by peach, and then apple.

Maybe it has something to do with what kind of mail they have, she mused. And, with an attention to data that would have made her brother Iggy proud, she began opening the little doors. Bills and a personal letter became a chocolate pie. Just bills became another cherry. An empty mailbox became gooseberry, and a copy of Nintendo Power became a thick, chewy shoo-fly pie.

After that she had to sit down for a while and let all that scientific research settle. She sank down into the shade of a tree and drowsed, one hand on her scaly belly.

"Missus Koopa?" asked a little mushroom girl.

"Snrk?" Wendy asked, blinking. Her eyes narrowed. Who was this puny little shroomlet who dared to approach the mighty and beautiful Wendy O.?

"P-please just leave," the little shroom asked, voice quivering. "Everybody is sad because they can't get their mail now."

"Tough," Wendy muttered around a burp. "You have about ten seconds to run, you little brat, before I turn you into a pie too."

"I'm not afraid of you," the girl said, but Wendy noticed how nervously she was holding the teddy bear she carried. Her little fingers had a pretty tight grip on it.

But not tight enough.

"Got your bear!" Wendy laughed, her claws ripping it from the little girl's gasp. "ZAA!"

The bear turned into a bright green lump of Gummi.

"Not Mr. Rumpypootlepants!" the girl shrieked, tears welling up in her eyes. "Give him back!"

"Too late!" Wendy said with a wicked chortle. She stuffed Mr. Rumpypootlepants into her mouth and chewed until the bear was nothing but green curds and saliva, which she cheerfully showed off to the hysterical girl before swallowing them.

"Give him back!" the girl cried, punching Wendy right in her soft yellow gut. But if Sid's punch had been a minor annoyance, this one was so mild the Koopaling barely felt it. Still--she decided to teach the little brat a lesson.

"Just for that," she puffed, getting to her feet with difficulty, "just for that, I'm gonna eat all your toys."
13133211.title: ...shows up on the stoop-a.

choices: Wendy wakes up ready to continue her rampage.
As she slumbers, the shrooms try to get the wand away from her.
131332111.content:
"I won't tell you where I live!" the little shroom said.

"You will," Wendy snapped. "Or I'll eat you."

She wasn't sure if the wand even worked on people, but her threat at least seemed to be effective. The little girl scowled, but led the way to a pleasant two-story mushroom house surrounded by beautiful flowers. Wendy followed her as quickly as she could, though her stomach was so full she couldn't move faster than a waddle.

A mushroom couple burst out of the front door and scooped up the girl, showering her with kisses.

"Oh, Sporina! Don't even do that again!" her mother sobbed.

"You scared us to death!" her father said, tears rolling down his cheeks. "Getting near that awful beast!"

Wendy frowned. "Excuse me," she snarled. "I am the delicate flower of World 8, the beautiful and refined--"

She paused for a quick belch.

"--princess of the Koopalings, Wendy O.!"

"Well, right now you're just a big fat bully who's standing in Mommy's prize tulips!" Sporina said, and stuck out her tongue. Before Wendy could find out if the wand worked, though, the girl's parents grabbed her and hustled her into the house. Wendy heard the lock click shut.

"Hmmph," she sniffed. Prize tulips, huh? Seized with a sudden malicious impulse, she waved her wand over the flowerbeds and quickly zaa-ed them into cupcake, which she tossed lazily down her throat one by one. She could tell the family in the house was peeking through the curtains at her, and tossed them a sideways smirk.

When Wendy had finished denuding the flower bed, she heaved herself up on the porch and zaa-ed the door. It turned into a large chocolate bar, from which she excavated a sizable hole for herself.

"Heeeere's Wendy," she teased, displaying sharp fangs smeared with chocolate and relishing the fear on the mushrooms' faces.

She attempted to push her way through, only to feel the sides squeezing in on her as it she were a cork in a bottle. Her belly was too distended to get through the opening. Annoyed, she planted her high heels in the chocolate and pushed herself back out again, then proceed to eat another inch of clearance around the hole.

This time, with a lot of effort and no small degree of grunting, she made it inside.

"Where's your room?" she snapped. The girl pointed. Up the stairs.

Wendy groaned.

The staircase had been intended for mushroom citizens, not full-figured Koopa girls. Getting up them was another ordeal, but she finally managed it by resting her gut on top of the bannister and scooting up.

"Now," she wheezed, a wicked grin spreading across her face, "I'm gonna eat all your--"

She stepped into the girl's room.

"T-toys?" she choked.

There must have been hundreds of them. Dolls and blocks, a rocking horse, a race track, a full-sized car, and a dollhouse that made Castle Koopa look like... some sort of smaller castle.

"Daddy makes toys for a living," the girl said.

"I guess he'll have to make you new ones, then," Wendy sneered, waving the wand around willy-nilly. She was beginning to regret her boast--her stomach really didn't want any more sweets right now--but she was determined to see it through.

Zaa! Crunch! There went a set of alphabet blocks, now giant sugar cubes.

Zaa! Slurp! She sucked up a fruit-snack race track.

Zaa! Glumph! She sat on the rocking horse, snapping it into fragments of nougat, and stuffed them down too.

Zaa! "Urk!"

Halfway through the gingerbread dollhouse, Wendy stopped eating. She hiccupped again, and a dribble of sugar-saturated drool dribbled down her chin.

"Let that... be a..." She burped. "...lesson to you."

With a supreme effort--she was so stuffed she was nearly spherical--Wendy hoisted herself into Sporina's bed.

"Where am I going to sleep?" the girl demanded.

Wendy just groaned. "Like I care."

And clutching the wand, she sank deep, deep into a sugar coma.
131332111.title: ...squeezes through a hoop-a.

choices: The mushrooms are barricading the door as fast as she can eat!
Wendy eats her way out and looks for a new Area to stuff herself with.
1313321111.content:
"Pull harder!"

"Yes, dear, I'm doing it, dear," grumbled Sporina's father, yanked on the end of the wand. His squishy fungal hands just couldn't gain any purchase on the slick metal. It didn't help that Wendy, still snoring and snorting away, had rolled over on top of it. Sporina's father put all his weight on the rod and tried to lever it out, but it didn't budge.

"A little help, if you please," the mush man suggested. His wife and daughter soon joined him, all three of them hanging from the rod, but all their weight could barely lift the Koopa girl's bloated body half a millimeter, so weighed down was she by sugary sludge.

Wendy burped in her sleep. "Zuhh," she muttered. There was a twinkle of magic and...

...for a moment the mushrooms didn't know what had happened. Then Wendy, still slumbering, took a big bite out of her pillow, which had turned into a marshmallow.

The mushrooms watched in shock as the sugary confection disappeared in a few slobbery bites. Now face down on the bed, Wendy groaned and muttered in her sleep.

"Say it again," Sporina's mother said. "Go on, fatty! Say it again!" She poked Wendy in one bulging flank. But it seemed that the Koopa girl was stuffed too full even to dream of eating; she just lay there like a big golden-scaled lump.

So, for the next few hours, the mushrooms pulled and tugged and set up blocks and tackles and inclined planes and all manner of fancy tools, while Wendy gurgled and digested. Night passed and turned back into day, and sixteen hours on the dot after flopping into bed, the young Koopa woke up and the mushroom citizens ran screaming.

"Aaaaaah, what a lovely nap!" she said sweetly, stretching the pins and needles out of her limbs. "Now, where was I? Oh, yes. Teaching this horrid little town a lesson."

She still felt sluggish and a little bloated, but her stomach was ready for breakfast. She pondered her options.

"Why get out of bed for breakfast," she decided, "when I can have the bed for breakfast? Zaa!"

Instantly she was lying in a thickly frosted sheet cake under a fruit-leather mattress, with a chocolate-chip cookie for a headboard and Twizzlers for springs. She dove in face first and cheerfully glutted herself until she found herself lying on the floor in a mess of frosting and cookie crumb, the bed nothing more than another few inches around her belly.

She stifled another belch. "Whoof. Getting... kinda full... again. I gotta start pacing myself."

Wendy waddled to the door, only to find that the mushrooms had locked her in.

"Okay. After I eat through this door, I'll start pacing myself..."
1313321111.title: Breakfast of Bed

choices: Wendy manages to eat her way through it all much easier than she expected
Wendy manages to eat her way through it all but it's one hell of a bellyache
13133211111.content:
When Wendy ripped off the first chunk of the door, much easier once it was peanut brittle, she noticed something frustrating. "What the- oh those little idiots..." Wendy growled when she saw the bookshelf pressed up against the door. And, through the cracks between the books, the cabinet. And wardrobe. And...second bed, probably from the girl's parents bedroom considering it was noticeably bigger than the one she'd just eaten. And dining room table with all three chairs, and refrigerator. Even things like a coffee table and a few lamps- stuff that was useless in terms of a barrier. It looked like they just piled up everything that wasn't nailed down in front of the door. She growled as she saw the two adults round the corner, carrying up their sofa and shoving that onto the pile of furniture.

"Hey!!!" Wendy roared through the cracks and holes in the makeshift barrier, causing the toads to jump back in alarm. "What's wrong with you- BELCH -morons?? Do you REALLY think a bunch of ugly interior decorating can stop ME?" The lady toad frowned, and yelled "Well we sure think it can slow you down!" Wendy's eyes narrowed and she sneered, insulted by this random toad's sheer cockiness. "Well if that's the case you better start running- And hope that you're right!" Raising her wand menacingly. She doubted she could get a clear shot through the barricade, but evidently the toads got the message as a look of fear overtook their expressions and they ran away, leaving their rotten little pile of garbage where it was. In her way.

At first, Wendy just tried to push through the barricade. She was still feeling a bit bloated from yesterday on top of the bed she'd just consumed, and it was all she could do to eat the whole door off its hinges. It was no use though, the furniture was just too tightly packed together and interlocked for her to shove aside, or even smash her way through. She groaned, clutching her engorged midsection. She could feel it gurgle sickeningly, already swollen to a dramatically oversized orb, tight with all the food packed in there already and hanging off of her body, which had become padded with a heavy layer of lard, which was thickest around her chunky thighs, bulbous rump, and squishy love handles which wrapped around her torso and formed some bulging back rolls. Her tail was sandwiched between her enlarged butt cheeks and these rolls, the size of her bottom now being enough to keep it propped up a bit at all times.

Wendy sighed, taking a handful of flab as she gripped one of her love handles with her free hand, giving it an experimental shake, watching the way the movement rippled through her flab, causing it to jiggle slightly, and causing her big old round gut to bounce furiously, wobbling a bit even after the momentum wore off. She felt her overworked stomach protest the jolt of motion with another resounding gurgle, which caused her to let out another loud, violent, undignified belch.

"Welp." She said, resigning herself to what seemed to be her only option as she raised the wand to the first of many obstacles, sarcastically mumbling "Looks like my breakfast's gonna have a second course...yay for me... ZAA!"
13133211111.title: Blocked in

choices: She woke up later, still in the house, the whole insane amount of food digested
She woke up later, all that food digested, but she wasn't in the same place...
131332111112.content:
Over an hour later, a very very bloated Wendy O. Koopa suppressed a gag as she forcefully crammed the last bite of a big oval shaped coffee cake, which WAS a coffee table before she blasted it, into her mouth. Her cheeks were bulging out like a chipmunk's, as her mouth was so full of cake that she could barely get it closed, a few crumbs tumbling out from between her plump lips. Her eyes teared up as she took a few deep breaths and braced herself, every muscle in her body tensing up as she strained her throat, agonizingly managing to swallow the mouthful of cake, somehow forcing it into her belly- her belly which was completely and totally packed full, not a single inch of room was left, even as her esophagus forced in the cake she could feel her gut stretching further, with a dangerous sounding creak. Once it was down, she sputtered a bit and gasped for air, panting as she desperately took in deep fast breaths, as if she'd just nearly drowned.

She felt like she'd been eating forever. It was a stretch to try and get that door down, but the barricade on top of that? More than a full hour of the repetitive grinding task. With a flick of her wand and a shout of the magic word, her obstructions turned into sugary junk food one by one. A bookshelf made of gingerbread with thick rich icing holding books like big square gumdrops, a wardrobe like a big spongey twinkie with enough cream to fill a bathtub, a cabinet made of fudge filled with a dozen different kinds of cookies, and a table like one big huge donut, and on and on and on like that, every crumb of cake, every drop of frosting, every fleck of chocolate, each single individual little calorie of the thousands and thousands that she was cramming into her gullet fistful at a time despite her stomach's increasingly vehement protest, eating so much her jaw hurt let alone her groaning creaking gut, adding to and expanding her considerable waistline more and more, her body swelling like a balloon and filling up more and more with every mawful of sugary rich junk.

Once she'd caught her breath, she looked up, eyes watering, moaning as she saw the large three person couch still sitting in her way. "huff...huff...Lasht...one....wheeze..." She groaned, raising her wand in a shaky hand and aiming it at the couch. "Zhh....zhuh..." She mumbled, breathing heavily. Luckily the wand seemed to count that, as a blast of colorful light erupted from its crystal and impacted the couch. Wendy moaned again as she saw it transform into a gigantic smore, huge sticky gelatinous marshmallows held between armrests and a backboard made from big broken chocolate bars, all supported on a frame of golden cinnamon scented graham crackers. With a sigh, Wendy braced herself, lurching forwards a bit, reaching out her arms to grab the couch and drag it closer to her enormity. A bit of fat hung from her arms, wobbling when she stuck them out to reach. For a moment she just stared at the oversized smore, wincing as she felt her engorged body protest. She was already swollen like a tick, she felt like she could burst. She took a few deep breaths, trying to push the pain out of her mind and focus. She shut her eyes tight, opened her mouth as far as she could make it go, straining her jaw muscles, before plunging face first into the warm gooey marshmallow cushion like she was diving into a pool. Her head fully submerged in the sugary sticky gelatin, she took a deep gulp, trying to swallow all of what got into her mouth. She could feel it get stuck in her throat- her body screaming at her. No more, it's too much, we're full. There's no more room, we couldn't possibly fit anything else, it yelled in agony. The clump of marshmallow was stuck in Wendy's throat. She literally couldn't swallow it fully, her belly was filled to the brim. She grunted, opening her mouth again and sticking it into the marshmallow. She used both her arms like scoops, her biceps and triceps burning as she pulled in gallons of pure melty marshmallow down her gullet, like a pump draining lakewater, tears welling up in her eyes as she defied the limitations of her capacity. She could feel it, her throat filling up, nothing more could get into her stomach. Until it filled up so much, it was at her lips. She tried scooping more in, but couldn't. She was full. Completely full. To the absolute brim- No more room at all, full.

She was almost blinded by white hot pain, but...she fought....fought through it...her arm shaking....she grabbed the furthest armrest...and pulled.

Pulled it...closer to her...

Closer...closer to her mouth...

It caught all of what remained of the cushions...pushing a tide of sticky gooey gelatinous marshmallow- the same marshmallow she'd already filled herself with to the absolute limit, clogging up her throat, dribbling out her mouth...

She pulllleeeeddd....cloosser.....

She opened her mouth- her mouth was full- full of that same sticky white goo...

She...almost..got...it...

She shoved the armrest into her face, clumsily using both arms to feed herself. She couldn't get it in at first- there was...just no...room...but she pushed harder....

cccrrrrrreeeaaaaak

With an ominous creak, like a balloon that was too filled with air, too stretched, just before it popped, Wendy felt it give. Her belly- her skin stretched, more, more- She was doing it. She went on autopilot, her arms working like pumps, shoveling everything into her mouth. She didn't stop when she heard the creaks, she didn't stop when she felt tears- she barely even registered the horror as she gorged and gorged and gorged, her jaw aching as it didn't close for a second, her throat stretched as she forced more and more and more down it, at a glacial pace, into her belly which tore up more and more, unable to hold the pressure. She ate- and ate- eating and eating and eating, gorging and glutting and stuffing, feeding herself through it all as she ate- ate- ate! Until she realized- there was nothing left to eat. Her eyes fluttered open in confusion... She stared at the empty space before her for a moment... Before her eyes rested on the wand. The wand, laying there in front of her on the ground. Among...a few loose crumbs.

Wendy's eyes widened. She looked around- nothing- a bare empty hallway. She started to cry, crying tears of complete and utter joy, pride, and relief.

"I...I....I did it....haha- Hahaha! Hah! I- i did it!!!!" She exclaimed gleefully. She was enormous, gigantic, huge! She completely filled the hallway, pressing against all four walls at once, even having cracked and broken them in places. She was nearly completely round, laying on her belly, her arms, chest, shoulderblades and head were the only things protruding from the enormous orb which the corridor couldn't even fully contain. On the other side of that orb, her legs protruded from it too, along with her nice round butt and tail. She checked herself- She could feel her legs, she could even kick them, though they weren't touching the ground. Her midsection, the round part, was gigantic, her skin had stretched so much that her scales were parted along most of it, unable to hold together and contain all of her body, her stomach plates were pulled apart and exposed several feet of her skin. Her skin itself felt so thin, so sensitive, it faded from pale pink to hotter and hotter red, and was covered in angry red stretch marks. But...no tears. No rips- she wasn't bursting open at the seams...she was fine!!! She squealed in glee, kicking her legs victoriously as she stuck out her arms like she was cheering, unable to control her laughter and tears of pure bliss.

"I did it!!!! I did it I did it I did it! I ate it- all of it- I ate it all and I'm okay! I can do anything! I can eat anything! I can eat anything- I can eat everything! I can eat everything!!! I can eat the whole UNIVERSE!!!!!" She squealed in triumph, though no one was around to hear her. Her celebration was cut short, however, as the adrenaline and all that strain on her body finally became too much for her conscious mind.

"Ghgnn- nyyArgh!" Wendy suddenly felt a surge of white hot pain, clutching her chest as her vision went spotty, and she passed out, her enormous body still stuck in the hallway.
131332111112.title: Stretched to the limit

choices: As Wendy's stay is over, she's set loose again, this time 1300 pounds heavier
Over time she grows bored, and decides to cause some mischief in the hospital...
1313321111122.content:
Everything was dark. It felt hot. Wendy wheezed, taking in a big gulp of air- She thought she heard some commotion then, and slowly, her eyes fluttered open- Only to shut again as she winced, a bright light shining right in her face. She groaned, still feeling pretty woozy, and blinked a few times as she fully came into consciousness. As her senses reignited, she was confused. This wasn't that toad house- she was staring up at a white ceiling with a few lights on it. It also looked like a window was open, as the room was brightly lit from more than just the lights on the ceiling. What is this? She suddenly realized she was hearing a voice, over to her right. "....Princess.... Princess Wendy.... Your majesty- can you hear me? Princess Wendy?" She turned her head to look- and realized a few things. First of all, there was a mask strapped to her face- a clear plastic one over her nose and mouth, with a tube running down from it. Secondly- she was huge! Almost all of that food she ate had digested, which made her wonder how long she'd been out, but it was plain to see that she had become enormously obese. She was laying on a bed- no- No- she was laying on three beds pushed together, and even they could barely hold up her bulk. She was just as big as she had been when she passed out, except now instead of tight and swollen and ready to burst, she was all soft and flabby, covered in hundreds and hundreds of pounds of jiggling lard, her belly was still so big that it split her stomach plates, allowing a few rolls of blubber to bulge out. The third thing she realized was that the person talking to her was a koopa- A nervous looking magikoopa with a white robe and hat who was clutching a clipboard, accompanied by a few nervous looking normal koopas and goombas, staring at her. Her head was partially sunken into her fat, which meant that her right cheek was obstructing the vision in her right eye, forcing her to squint as she turned her head and looked at the magikoopa. "Wha...Where the heck am I? How'd I get here?"

The magikoopa perked up, seeming relieved that she was okay. "Oh thank goodness Princess- I- well- My name is Doctor Kamek K. Kambridge, I'm a Medikoopa- like- like Magikoopa but for medicine." He explained. Wendy furrowed her brow.

"I don't care." she informed him.

"I...right- Of course- my apologies your majesty." Doctor Kamek said sheepishly. "You're in the bariatrics ward of Saint Kamella the inhumane's Koopa Kingdom Hospital. We- a paratroopa heard reports of you attacking a toad village, and so he sent for reinforcements just in case Mario showed up. But- but when they found you in that house you were so...bloated, and asleep, and they thought you were gonna pop! So they brought you here. It took eight clowncopters to pick you up once they broke down the house to get you out, and they had to bring you here on a battleship." He finished his explanation, as Wendy looked around and realized, yeah- She was in a hospital. There was a heart monitor and an IV hooked up to her, along with an oxygen mask and a bunch of electrodes.

"Huh...I didn't know... shinsh when did we have a hoshpital?" Wendy asked, her flabby body sloshing as she tried to get a good look at her surroundings.

"It's new your majesty." Doctor Kamek informed her, taking a step to the right to get a better look at her face, as it appeared submerged in fat from a few angles when she turned her head. He had never seen anything like this before- Even the Heavy Troopas were only a fraction of her size. She towered above him like a golden, jiggling mountain. "...Princess- is there anything you want, now that you're awake?" He nervously asked.

"...my shoesh." She said, still not looking at him. He blinked, confused. "I...what?"
"MY SHOESH YOU IDIOT!" Wendy shouted, looking at him. He jumped back, alarmed, "Get 'em offa me! My brasheletsh too- and my necklashe- it's too tight!" Quickly, a few paratroopas and paragoomas flew up to fulfill to her demand. The golden hoops which previously hung loosely from her wrists were now tightly squeezed on there, fat bulging out around them so much that they weren't even visible. It took three paratroopas pulling with all their strength to get them off of Wendy's thick arms which seemed to surge outwards with fat once they were freed. Her pearl necklace was stretched out to its limit, and one parakoopa had to cut through the string, which caused it to burst off as Wendy's tire of neck flab billowed out, no longer held back. Her pink high heels were already barely holding together, more of her foot fat was bulging out of the stretched tops than shoved into them, and two paragoomas, nervously realizing they didn't have arms, pulled them off with their mouths, one at a time, which allowed Wendy's large pillowy feet to bulge outwards in freedom, she wiggled her large soft toes- which her pedicured claws had partially sunken into, due to how fat they'd become. "aaahhh....now that'sh a lot better...." Wendy said.

"We uh... Princess Wendy, We have the wand that was found with you at the scene-" Doctor Kamek said. Wendy looked up at him, her interest piqued. He was, indeed holding it. She took a good look at it, regarding its craftmanship once again. It really was a pretty wand, the whole ice cream cone look was cute- She liked that about it, and how it stood out from other wands in look as well as function. Doctor Kamek held it out to her, making sure it was within her reach- As she wasn't in much of a state to move around. She hesitated for a moment...Should she? She glanced down at her enormous body, with medical equipment hooked up to every other roll of fat. She'd intended to pace herself with this thing...maybe have a little fun, indulge a bit, but nothing this extreme. Should she really take it again?

She looked back at the wand...and reached out her pudgy arm- her arm which was almost thicker than it was long at this point. Doctor K handed it to her, her thick sausage fingers closing around the handle. She regarded it. It wasn't her fault that she ate this much, she thought. It was that dumb old family of toads. That rotten little girl who had so many toys and her even rottener parents who tried to barricade her in. She beat them though- in the end she ate everything they could throw at her. But- only because they threw it at her, not because she was greedy or gluttony or whatever. She could totally be trusted with this thing, she wouldn't let herself go. As soon as she had that thought though- she felt her belly gurgle.

"...How long was I out, doc?" she asked, still regarding the wand.

"Oh- uh- about a day. We found you in the morning, and you slept for the rest of the day and night." He said. Wendy thought for a minute, before looking at him with an eyebrow raised.

"So, that means I need to make up yesterday's brunch, lunch, dinner, and dessert before I have my breakfast today." The doctor just stared at her, mouth agape. He was about to say no- No that's insane, she was already dangerously overstuffed, no way were they gonna let her have that much food in such- "Well what are you waiting for???" Wendy said.

"I....yes, your majesty- I'll talk to the kitchen staff right away!" He said, running out the door followed by some of the others. Wendy smirked, saying to herself "I didn't use the wand- I'd call that pretty good self control."
1313321111122.title: Getting some proper care

After eating, Wendy thinks of a few more ways she'd like to use her wand...
13133211111221.content:
About another day and a half passed before Wendy's stay in the hospital finally came to an end. Because of her royal blood, the hospital staff was eager to wait on her hand and foot, half the nurses seemed to be in a permanent state of panicked rushing to fulfill her every request to the best of their ability. Some of her most frequent requests involved luxurious full body massages, dozens of koopas kneading her doughy flab and trying to sooth her skin around the stretch marks. She would also consistently order to have her large feet licked- An old tendency which more experienced staff members might have recalled King Koopa himself having back in the day. And, of course, even though her obesity due to extreme overeating is exactly what got her in there in the first place, her most frequent demand was for food. The doctors were always hesitant, of course, especially on days where she'd had ten full meals before noon and was ordering them to prepare her an especially hearty lunch, but what could they do except oblige? She was their princess after all. She would almost always insist that the portion sizes of whatever they gave her were pitiful, even if they were already giving her five times what she was supposed to be getting. She'd order that they go and get her more, a real substantial meal- bigger than whatever they just got her, without actually allowing them to take the food they already gave her so they could add to it. She'd still eat it, just want another bigger one after. Of course, it was all health food, some kind of foul smelling vegetable protein slop, the staff always wondered how she could possibly want to eat so much of it. But, of course, once her oxygen mask was lifted and she was allowed to eat, she'd glance around to make sure no one was watching- and quietly whisper that precious magic word, causing the gross slop they were trying to keep her on a strict diet of into something more palatable, like a little pile of pudding, or ice cream, or a warm rich chocolate mousse. The staff never caught her in the act, but it did seem odd to them that the super low calorie high fiber and roughage paste which was all they fed her didn't reduce her weight at all, and in fact she only seemed to bloat up even more during her stay. Soon, her time was up, and they'd gotten her into a stable condition, so she was ready to be sent home.

"Now, Princess Wendy, please remember, make sure to keep your oxygen mask on as often as you possibly can- And don't forget to keep the pacemaker fully charged at all times!" Doctor Kamek said, staring up concerned at his massive patient and superior, as her blob-like form towered over him like a hill. "Mhm." She said passively. She wasn't even looking at him, he saw her examining the fingernails on her free hand, the hand that wasn't clutching her wand. She had received a new set of makeup as celebration of her successful treatment...which just meant that the people at the hospital gave it to her because they were scared of what she'd do if they didn't. Part of that was a manicure and pedicure- both of which were somewhat difficult to pull off due to her hands and feet having become so thickened with fat that her finger and toe claws were partially submerged in flab. She seemed to be okay with how it turned out though, considering how it took up more of her attention than Doctor Kamek trying to describe her new life support system.

"And- and please don't remove the electrodes! Make sure nothing interrupts the connection to them and your heart monitor, Keep the body plugged in as often as possible, it's connected directly to your defibrillator. There are five backup batteries just in case of emergencies, keep the system clean and...what else what else.... Oh! Please, maintain a strict diet, please don't eat anything too sugary or greasy, especially not in large capacities." That made Wendy chuckle a little, she looked down at the Doctor. She was currently being held on a large cushioned platform, being held up and carried by twenty green paratroopas. Two red paratroopas hovered by her side, holding the cabinet of computers and machines which was hooked up to her body by several dozen wires and tubes, beeping softly as a heart monitor kept tabs on her condition. Wendy sat there, barefoot, obese beyond reason. Her legs stuck out straight, fat feet nowhere near touching the ground, suspended in the middle of them. They looked like great rings of flab, so much fat resting around her calves and thighs that her legs had a horizontal radius greater than their length, and they bulged out, squishing against the ground as she sat, and against her enormous belly which sprawled out between them and forced them to spread apart, making room for it. The plates across her underbelly were still spread apart near the middle, the size of her gut enough to part them and allow for a few bulging strips of pinkish flab to bulge out. Her belly actually hung off of the front of the platform she was seated on, hanging in a few paratroopa's faces, so they had to duck to see where they were flying, and it was the part of her which was sticking right out directly in front of Doctor Kamek's face. Her monstrous gut ran up over her wide hips and thighs, a few thick folds making up some love handles which you could hide a goomba in. Her gigantic shapely rump was quite a sight too, each individual cheek on that fat ass was bigger than a chain chomp, and it wobbled like a pair of balloons filled as full as they could get with jello. The rolls of back flab which came off her love handles sat on top of her rump like a shelf, as fat around her shoulderblades bulged out and rested on those. Her arms were about as thick as they were long, sorta like her legs, and her hands poked out of the fat wrists they were partially sunken into. The fat from her arms would hang and wobble when she moved to do something with them, but she could also just rest them on her own love handles, like a pair of big armrests on a sofa. Her chest had expanded too, a pair of nice big breasts sat on atop her belly, round- but warped a bit by their own gravity as they rested on her gut. Her face was framed by a thick tire of neck fat comprising of two hefty rolls, her head sinking into them a bit, as she had a couple of big chubby cheeks, each one almost as big as her head, and a voluptuous double chin bulging out, which gave her whole face a very rotund soft look. She smirked down at Doctor Kamek through the oxygen mask tied around her head with elastic, her eyes narrowed a bit with one eyebrow raised. "Oh, trusht me doctor, I'm pretty shure I know how to eat well."

"Well...ok..." the Medikoopa said, hesitating as he gazed up at her. "Have a safe flight, your majesty!" With that, the little entourage of paratroopas grunted, lifting Wendy's enormity into the air, her fat body wobbling, before they dropped her platform off gently in the middle of the deck of her personal airship. It lifted off, all her minions running around the deck, tending to what needed tending to. Wendy sighed in relief, as she felt the warm outside air of the bright sunny day wash over her obese form, tickling the bits of exposed skin on her belly, as she flexed her toes and spread her arms, that precious wand clutched in her right hand, taking in the freedom. "Well..." she said, a sinister smirk forming on her face as she looked over to a nearby Hammer Bro, loyally saluting its obese princess. "We're finally shomeplashe that shtupid Doctor can't shee me...Do you have the shtuff I wanted?" The Hammer Bro nodded and ran over to a door to the ship's lower decks, throwing it open and yelling down "Guys, she's here! C'mon, move move move!" Wendy's confident smile grew as about a dozen koopas of several types all poured out from the lower deck, each one carrying as many bags of bottom of the barrel unhealthy as they come fast food, burgers and fries dripping with so much grease it saturated the bags, and to top it all off- A pair of chargin' chucks came up last of all, holding between the two of them a ten layer cake with the words 'Welcome Back To Not Being In The Hospital For Obesity Princess Wendy!' written on it in icing... it was a big cake, there was plenty of room for letters. Wendy's eyes twinkled as she licked her lips, lazily lounging back into her own comfy, soft flab, using her back fat and rump as a sofa and her hefty love handles as arm rests, her own bulging calves were suitable footstools for her big, pillowy, bare feet. She grinned and laughed, wiggling her oversized toes with a laugh and exclaiming "Well what are you all waiting for? Shomeone shtart licking my feet, and shomeone elshe come get thish mask off and feed me!"
